elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Look at the diagrams and think in pairs about typical examples of their use in everyday business life.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Stacked bar chart (stacked to 100%)
elements.correctAnswer: Point distribution: monthly, quarterly or annual sales of various departments or branches, no intermediate values possible, meaningful and available.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Look at the diagrams and think in pairs about typical examples of their use in everyday business life.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Pie chart
elements.correctAnswer: Point distribution: monthly, quarterly or annual sales of a department or branch, no comparison with other departments or branches in the same diagram possible.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Look at the diagrams and think in pairs about typical examples of their use in everyday business life.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Line diagram
elements.correctAnswer: Development, e.g. price trends, temperature, public transport utilization during a day, a week, sales trends, comparisons possible within a diagram, many intermediate values possible, course of the lines (rising, falling) says something.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Look at the diagrams and think in pairs about typical examples of their use in everyday business life.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Network diagram
elements.correctAnswer: Focal points, e.g. survey evaluation (individual questions could also be shown as pie charts), customer satisfaction, political and social orientation, selection of apprenticeships (what is important for choosing this training?).
